title: Falling All In
description: As her best friend's wedding approaches, Mindy believes she'll never find her perfect love story. After a history of bad relationships, she stands on the sidelines once again as everyone around her finds their place in life and love.Until Austin.Austin has one love and one love only: photography. His sole focus is on his career. After a painful breakup in college, he doesnâ€™t want love and the heartbreak it brings.Until Mindy.Falling All In is a fast-paced and light-hearted romance filled with ups and downs, and second chances that come when you least expect them.
author: Gia Kim
